availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Robert Hughes (Washington County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married Susanna J. Davidson Hughes in Washington County, Kentucky on May 27, 1843. Married Mary Rice McElroy Hughes in Washington County, Kentucky on June 10, 1847. Father of Susanna Hughes Allen, Sally Hughes Ray, Anthony Hughes, James Hughes, and Mary Hughes. Physician in Washington County, Kentucky in 1850. Accused Cornelius Bradshaw and Lyman Guinnip of stealing an enslaved person in 1862. Resident of Washington County, Kentucky in 1863. .
